revised_title: Potassium Utilization in Bact. ladis aerogenes
tldr: The authors studied the utilization of potassium by Bact. ladis aerogenes and found that cells take up nearly all the potassium from the medium. Potassium plays the part of an enzyme-activator and is displaced by the acid formed during growth. The relationship between the number of cells and potassium concentration is developed and agrees with experimental facts.
